Jim, thanks for the info, back to the books for me :-)

Having much interest in the NBTHK AB catalogue, how would I get my
hands on one of these as I am not a member and will sadly miss another
great ( actually 2 ) exhibition

Cheers mate

Rich


IIn addition to the handouts, the NBTHK AB will again be publishing a
glossy soft
cover photo book documenting the display, and this time the tsuba will be
included as well. I believe that this will be available for purchase
by non
members when they're available.
